title: Segmentation fault on 'go get' on Ubuntu LTS
body:
1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
go version xgcc (Ubuntu 4.9.3-0ubuntu4) 4.9.3 linux/amd64

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOCHAR="6"
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOOS="linux"
GOPATH="/home/username/GoProjects"
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/usr"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/lib/gccgo/tool"
TERM="dumb"
CC="gcc"
GOGCCFLAGS="-g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"

3. What did you do?
go get github.com/linkedin/burrow

4. What did you expect to see?
Get an installed package

5. What did you see instead?
Segmentation Fault
[Core dump](https://s3.amazonaws.com/wix-shareable/go-core.gz)
